description: We will use a nested sampling design. Sites will be distributed throughout Abernathy Creek, WA watershed and downstream 100m from Washington Department of Fish and Wildlife Intensively Monitored Watershed GRRTS electrofishing multipass sites.  At each site we will sample twelve 1 m x 1 m quadrats distributed in the mid channel and along the creek margins (within 20 cm of bank) in six transects spaced every 10 m.  Sites will be sampled during low flows in August and September of 2021.

userSamples.name: BPA Sample for Study Design VSP monitoring, adult salmonid data collection spawning ground surveys (abundance, diversity and distribution), spawning ground surveys WSE 76333 (9548)

title: Assessment of larval lamprey use in areas of salmonid habitat restoration vs non-restoration in Abernathy Creek, WA
